--------------------------------- Test Case: testUserAdd[Excel row 8] Description: Best practice: organize like tests into a single sheet. If convenient, it is a good idea to organize a sheet of tests such that it can be run independently. This is not always possible in the cases where a lot of pre-existing data needs to be set up (thus the need for a test fixture sheet).
This sheet provides an example of ADD event tests. Sheets may be executed autonomously and asynchronously. ---------------------------------
